00086 #ifndef _common_types_
00087 #define _common_types_
00088 
00089 #ifdef __cplusplus
00090    extern "C" {
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 /*
00094 ** Includes
00095 */
00096 
00097 /*
00098 ** Macro Definitions
00099 */
00100 
00101 /* 
00102 ** Condition = TRUE is ok, Condition = FALSE is error 
00103 */
00104 #define CompileTimeAssert(Condition, Message) typedef char Message[(Condition) ? 1 : -1]
00105 
00106 
00107 /*
00108 ** Define compiler specific macros
00109 ** The __extension__ compiler pragma is required
00110 ** for the uint64 type using GCC with the ANSI C90 standard.
00111 ** Other macros can go in here as needed, for example alignment 
00112 ** pragmas.
00113 */
00114 #if defined (__GNUC__)
00115    #define _EXTENSION_  __extension__
00116    #define OS_PACK      __attribute__ ((packed))
00117    #define OS_ALIGN(n)  __attribute__((aligned(n)))
00118    #define OS_USED      __attribute__((used))
00119 #else
00120    #define _EXTENSION_ 
00121    #define OS_PACK
00122    #define OS_ALIGN(n) 
00123    #define OS_USED 
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 #if defined(_ix86_) || defined (__i386__)
00127 /* ----------------------- Intel x86 processor family -------------------------*/
00128   /* Little endian */
00129   #undef   _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00130   #define  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00131 
00132   typedef unsigned char                         boolean;
00133   typedef signed char                           int8;
00134   typedef short int                             int16;
00135   typedef long int                              int32;
00136  _EXTENSION_ typedef long long int              int64; 
00137   typedef unsigned char                         uint8;
00138   typedef unsigned short int                    uint16;
00139   typedef unsigned long int                     uint32;
00140   _EXTENSION_ typedef unsigned long long int    uint64;
00141 
00142   typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00143 
00144 #elif defined (_ix64_) || defined (__x86_64__) 
00145 /* ----------------------- Intel/AMD x64 processor family -------------------------*/
00146   /* Little endian */
00147   #undef   _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00148   #define  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00149 
00150   typedef unsigned char                         boolean;
00151   typedef signed char                           int8;
00152   typedef short int                             int16;
00153   typedef int                                   int32;
00154   typedef long int                              int64;
00155   typedef unsigned char                         uint8;
00156   typedef unsigned short int                    uint16;
00157   typedef unsigned int                          uint32;
00158   typedef unsigned long int                     uint64;
00159 
00160   typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00161 
00162 #elif defined(__PPC__) || defined (__ppc__)
00163    /* ----------------------- Motorola Power PC family ---------------------------*/
00164    /* The PPC can be programmed to be big or little endian, we assume native */
00165    /* Big endian */
00166    #define _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00167    #undef  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00168 
00169    typedef unsigned char                        boolean;
00170    typedef signed char                          int8;
00171    typedef short int                            int16;
00172    typedef long int                             int32;
00173    _EXTENSION_ typedef long long int            int64;
00174    typedef unsigned char                        uint8;
00175    typedef unsigned short int                   uint16;
00176    typedef unsigned long int                    uint32;
00177    _EXTENSION_ typedef unsigned long long int   uint64;
00178 
00179   typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00180 
00181 #elif defined(_m68k_) || defined(__m68k__)
00182    /* ----------------------- Motorola m68k/Coldfire family ---------------------------*/
00183    /* Big endian */
00184    #define _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00185    #undef  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00186 
00187    typedef unsigned char                        boolean;
00188    typedef signed char                          int8;
00189    typedef short int                            int16;
00190    typedef long int                             int32;
00191    _EXTENSION_ typedef long long int            int64;
00192    typedef unsigned char                        uint8;
00193    typedef unsigned short int                   uint16;
00194    typedef unsigned long int                    uint32;
00195    _EXTENSION_ typedef unsigned long long int   uint64;
00196 
00197   typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00198 
00199 #elif defined (__ARM__) || defined(__arm__)
00200 /* ----------------------- ARM processor family -------------------------*/
00201   /* Little endian */
00202   #undef   _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00203   #define  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00204 
00205   typedef unsigned char                         boolean;
00206   typedef signed char                           int8;
00207   typedef short int                             int16;
00208   typedef long int                              int32;
00209   _EXTENSION_ typedef long long int             int64;
00210   typedef unsigned char                         uint8;
00211   typedef unsigned short int                    uint16;
00212   typedef unsigned long int                     uint32;
00213   _EXTENSION_ typedef unsigned long long int    uint64;
00214 
00215   typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00216 
00217 #elif defined(__SPARC__) || defined (_sparc_)
00218    /* ----------------------- SPARC/LEON family ---------------------------*/
00219    /* SPARC Big endian */
00220    #define _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00221    #undef  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00222 
00223    typedef unsigned char                        boolean;
00224    typedef signed char                          int8;
00225    typedef short int                            int16;
00226    typedef long int                             int32;
00227    _EXTENSION_ typedef long long int            int64;
00228    typedef unsigned char                        uint8;
00229    typedef unsigned short int                   uint16;
00230    typedef unsigned long int                    uint32;
00231    _EXTENSION_ typedef unsigned long long int   uint64;
00232 
00233    typedef unsigned long int                     cpuaddr;
00234 
00235 #else  /* not any of the above */
00236    #error undefined processor
00237 #endif  /* processor types */
00238 
00239 #ifndef NULL              /* pointer to nothing */
00240    #define NULL ((void *) 0)
00241 #endif
00242 
00243 #ifndef TRUE              /* Boolean true */
00244    #define TRUE (1)
00245 #endif
00246 
00247 #ifndef FALSE              /* Boolean false */
00248    #define FALSE (0)
00249 #endif
00250 
00251 /* 
00252 ** Check Sizes 
00253 */
00254 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(uint8)==1,  TypeUint8WrongSize);
00255 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(uint16)==2, TypeUint16WrongSize);
00256 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(uint32)==4, TypeUint32WrongSize);
00257 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(uint64)==8, TypeUint64WrongSize);
00258 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(int8)==1,   Typeint8WrongSize);
00259 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(int16)==2,  Typeint16WrongSize);
00260 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(int32)==4,  Typeint32WrongSize);
00261 CompileTimeAssert(sizeof(int64)==8,  Typeint64WrongSize);
00262 
00263 #ifdef __cplusplus
00264    }
00265 #endif
00266 
00267 #endif  /* _common_types_ */
